name: One More Color Ballz
description:
Relax your brain with color balls - the addictive game - ,one of the best time killer game.

Just use the paddle to drag the ball and put it in the basket.
When the balls goes to the basket successfully, your score will increase. Use it to challenge your friends and be the champion.

Try to catch items as they appear to increase the level of the ball, so that when the ball passes the basket you will get more points.
Ball games are always addictive when combined with the color it becomes even more wonderful, enjoy it entertain and kill time.

Game Features:
◉ Simple ball control
◉ Always Free to play
◉ Endless GamePlay
◉ Challenge your friends with the best highscore
Keywords:
◉ Color Ballz
◉ Balls
◉ Color
◉ 100 Balls
◉ Killer Time
